1178870.name: RPG Maker MV - VX Ace ＆ XP Hero Pack
1178870.description:
The beloved characters from RPG Maker VX Ace and RPG Maker XP are now set up and ready to battle in RPG Maker MV!

This MV compatible character pack has all the basics you need to set up these hero characters for their big battles with Side-View animated Battlers, Walking Sprites, Battlers, Face and Bust-Up images, as well as 50 Battleback graphics for various battle scenes!

FEATURES:

Characters from VX Ace:

* 40 Hero characters with Walking Sprites and damage poses, Face, Bust-Up image, SV animated Battlers
* 74 Battlers (static): Angel, Evil King, Assassin, Gargoyle, Behemoth, Cockatrice, Evil God, Succubus and much more!

Characters from XP:

* 48 Hero characters with Walking Sprites and down pose, Face, Bust-Up images
* 100 Battlers (static): All 48 hero characters included＋Undead, Snake, Aquatic monsters, Beast, Goblin, Bird, Devil, Elemental and much more!
* 50 Battlebacks: Common places ＋Inner Body, Ship Deck, Inside Church, In front of Thrones, Desert Town, Heaven, Outer Space, Evil Castle and more!

* Bonus! 56 Battlers (static) from RPG Maker VX!

* This pack is licensed for use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker only! Although most editing is permitted for this pack, Faceset and Bust-up graphics are not permitted to be edited
1178870.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
